data.text:
After a bit of a shakey start 2am check-in!
James the manager & his team were excellant, they couldnt  be more helpful.
We were moved to a bigger room which was amzing.
The Hotel is spotlessly clean everywhere. Breakfast has a good variety of hot& cold options to suit all tastes.
Complimentry waters left everyday in the room.
Its location is about 20mins in a taxi from almost anywhere & taxi are cheap on the 
Careem app.
data.title: Small friendly super clean stay!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Jilly,
"I am thrilled to hear that you had a wonderful experience at the HE Hotel by Gewan. Your gracious comments about our products and services are greatly appreciated, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon. Best regards,"
Management.
owner_response.author: HE Hotel

data.text:
This is not an actual hotel, but an apartment building with everything that comes with it. The property is marketed as a five star hotel, which is absolutely not the case in reality. It is just an ordinary apartment building, located far from anything interesting in Dubai and surrounded by construction sites, so that noise and dust will be present at any moment during your stay. 
There is really nothing which will stand as a good argument in favor of this property.
data.title: Stay away

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Gabi,
Thank you for your valuable feedback following your recent stay with us.
Only with the feedback from our guests we are able to constantly optimize our service. It is not our intention to disappoint our guest and it is obvious, that we did not meet your expectations in this occasion. We have shared your feedback with the relevant department.
We are looking forward to the possibility of welcoming you back to our Hotel
Best Regards,
Managements.
owner_response.author: HE Hotel

data.text:
I’d like to thank the great, friendly, professional front office staff James and Mohamed Mahmoud, I liked the professional housekeeping service by the polite Noman and Sanaullah, add to all the cheerful, excellent service by Abdul Naser, Mohamed Abu HInd, Fidaa, Tejesri and Mariem at the restaurant lounge.
The only issue was the construction sound from the area around the hotel unfortunately.
عبد الناصر في Leo Lounge من أجمل الشخصيات في المكان، شكر خاص للاحترافية وحسن الاستقبال
data.title: Great

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ms. Sally ,
Thank you for choosing HE Hotel by Gewan and sharing your flattering feedback with us on TripAdvisor.com.
We are very delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.

Please be sure that your valued feedback will be shared with the relevant departments, Please be sure that your valued feedback will be shared with the relevant departments,
Delivering the best hospitality service to our guests is our main goal and we are truly delighted that we have achieved it.We are looking forward to welcome you back to HE Hotel in the near future.
Best Regards.
Managements.
owner_response.author: HE Hotel

data.text: Every thing is good spicaly Breck fast i fell like home thank u for spicaly Tejasri and oshi feedar will visitagain its really good experience and room very clean pool every thing i enjoy i suggest and it is near to metro station thak you everyonethank you
data.title: Good

data.text: I injoyed my time at the hotel, I would like to thank the Housekeeping who cleaned my room, the breakfast was excellent. I would like to thank all the staff for there welcome. Shisha Lounge it was very good service special thank to Mr. Abdo for his professional service
data.title: Good place
